braveSearch.name: Brave Web / Internet Search
braveSearch.description: Search the web / internet using Brave for up-to-date information. Use the 'query' parameter with your search terms.

parameters.query: The search query or search terms to find on the web. Example: 'latest AI news' or 'Python programming tutorial'

tavilySearch.name: Tavily Web Search
tavilySearch.description: Search the web using the Tavily API. Use the 'query' parameter with your search terms.

parameters.query: The search query or search terms to find on the web. Example: 'latest AI news' or 'Python programming tutorial'
parameters.max_results: Maximum number of search results to return

webContentExtractor.name: Web Content Extractor
webContentExtractor.description: Extract clean, readable content from an URL. This can be content like PDFs or webpages, removing ads, headers, footers, and other non-content elements. Use the 'url' parameter with a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL.

parameters.url: The full URL of the webpage to extract content from. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL. Example: 'https://example.com/article'
parameters.maxLength: Maximum length of extracted content in characters (default: 5000)
parameters.ignoreSSL: Ignore invalid HTTPS certificates (default: false, admin configurable)

enhancedWebSearch.name: Enhanced Web Search with Content
enhancedWebSearch.description: Performs web search and automatically extracts full content from the top results for comprehensive information gathering. Perfect for 'chat with web' functionality. Use the 'query' parameter with your search terms.

parameters.query: The search query or search terms to find on the web. Example: 'artificial intelligence trends 2024' or 'best programming languages'
parameters.extractContent: Whether to extract full content from search results (default: true)
parameters.maxResults: Maximum number of search results to process and extract content from (default: 3)
parameters.contentMaxLength: Maximum length of extracted content per page in characters (default: 3000)

deepResearch.name: Deep Research
deepResearch.description: Perform iterative web research with progress updates via SSE events.

parameters.maxResults: Number of results to process per round
parameters.contentMaxLength: Maximum length of extracted content per page

researchPlanner.name: Research Planner
researchPlanner.description: Break down a research topic into distinct investigative tasks

evaluator.name: Answer Evaluator
evaluator.description: Evaluate answers for definitiveness, freshness and completeness.

queryRewriter.name: Query Rewriter
queryRewriter.description: Rewrite user search queries into optimized variations.

playwrightScreenshot.name: Website Screenshot (Playwright)
playwrightScreenshot.description: Capture a screenshot or PDF of a webpage using Playwright.

parameters.fullPage: Capture full page or visible area only

answerReducer.name: Answer Reducer
answerReducer.description: Merge multiple text passages into a single concise article.

seleniumScreenshot.name: Website Screenshot (Selenium)
seleniumScreenshot.description: Capture a screenshot or PDF of a webpage using Selenium.

parameters.fullPage: Capture full page or visible area only

entraPeopleSearch.name: Entra People Search
entraPeopleSearch.description: Query the corporate directory for people and teams

findUser.description: Find a user by name or email

getAllUserDetails.description: Get all details for a user

getUserManager.description: Get the direct manager of a user

getUserGroups.description: List teams the user belongs to

getUserPhotoBase64.description: Get a user's profile photo as Base64

iFinder.name: iFinder Document Management
iFinder.description: Comprehensive document search, content retrieval, and management for the iFinder system

search.description: Search for documents in the iFinder system

parameters.query: Search query to find documents in iFinder. Example: 'contract proposals' or 'technical documentation'
parameters.maxResults: Maximum number of search results to return (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.searchProfile: Search profile ID (optional, uses default if not specified)
parameters.returnFields: Fields to return in search results (optional)

getContent.description: Fetch document content from iFinder for LLM processing

parameters.documentId: Document ID to fetch content for. Example: 'doc123456'
parameters.searchProfile: Search profile ID (optional, uses default if not specified)

getMetadata.description: Fetch detailed metadata for a specific document from iFinder

parameters.documentId: Document ID to fetch metadata for. Example: 'doc123456'
parameters.searchProfile: Search profile ID (optional, uses default if not specified)
